alert.note: Alert for Central Grant County, Silver City Area; Southern Gila Region Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 1:01PM MST until January 04 at 5:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches possible above 7000 ft and 1 to 3 inches between 6000 and 7000 ft. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...High elevations of the Gila Region including the Black Range and Silver City. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Grant County, Silver City Area; Southern Gila Region Highlands, Black Range
